content.question: The contemporary drawing above of the storming of the Bastille was intended to portray

choices.label: aristocratic support for the old regime
popular participation in the revolutionary process
the determination of the military to resist change at any cost
peasants protesting high rents for land
the imprisonment of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette after the September Massacres

content.answer: popular participation in the revolutionary process

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
